reference: Becker, Brian and Craig Olson, Labor Relations and Firm Performance, in M. Kleiner et. al., Human Resources and the Performance of the Firm, Madison, Industrial Relations Research Association, 1987.

Freeman, Richard B., and James Medoff, What Do Unions Do?, Basic Books, New York, 1984.
Lazear, Edward, Personnel Economics, MIT Press, Cambridge, MA., 1995.
National Research Council, The Competitive Status of the U.S. Civil Aviation Manufacturing Industry, 1985.
